title: Meet Ippolito Lamedica, Master Trainer and Child Participation Expert.
first_phrase: In this section, the focus is on experts and researchers in the field of experiential learning, participation of children, hypnosis, and PNL. It includes the profile of Ippolito Lamedica, who is a scientific referent for UNICEF and a specialist in mind development working with Entheos Avatar and ISI-CNV. The section also introduces the team of researchers from ISI-CNV, such as Prof. Aldo Setti, Prof. Giuliano Capani, Prof. René William Leon, Raymi Phenix, Dr. E.Massone, and Prof. Jean Pierre Giudicelli de Cressac Bachellerie. This team is composed of experts in various areas, including communication, cinema, hypnosis, and medicine. The text highlights their expertise and qualifications in the field, providing a comprehensive overview of their roles and contributions to the topic of experiential learning.
content: Sito web: www.aldosetti.com Prof. Giuliano Capani Docente di Cinema all'Università del Salento. Studioso di PNL e documentarista. Sito web:www.giulianocapani.info ________________ Prof. René William Leon Professore all’Università del Nepal e Coordinatore del Cairn in Nepal Sito web: www.dzogchen.ws Raymi Phénix Raymi Phenix, è un virtuoso dell’ipnosi e del mentalismo.Formatosi presso il nostro Istituto e presso altri istituti Francesi di ipnosi. E’ uno show man, un formatore e un terapeuta certificato a Nizza. Dr. E.Massone Medico specializzato in medicina cinese e in agopuntura, esperto di pnl, effettua la sua attività a Nizza. Prof Jean Pierre Giudicelli de Cressac Bachellerie Professore della Facoltà di Nizza. Esperto in tecniche ipnotiche e in pratiche di presenza.
last_phrase: For more information on these experts in NLP, Hypnosis, Cinematography, and other fields, visit the provided websites. Contact them to advance your skills in these areas and improve your personal and professional development.
